FuncDef: This command configures the XMPP server as well as the Jabber ID that the 7750 SR, 7450 ESS, or 7950 XRS will use for the XMPP communication with the server. The system uses DNS to resolve the configured domain-name.
CLIs: server <xmpp-server-name> [ domain-name <fqdn> ] [ username <user-name> ] [ password <password> ] [ create ] [ service-name <service-name> ]
server <xmpp-server-name> [ domain-name <fqdn> ] [ username <user-name> ] [ password <password> ] [ create ] [ router <router-instance> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the server in lower-case letters.
Specifies the Fully Qualified Domain Name of the server.
Specifies the user-name part of the Jabber ID.
Specifies the password part of the Jabber ID s user.
Keyword used to create the server instance.

Specifies the router name or service ID used to identify the router instance. Values-router-instance: router-name or vprn-svc-id, |router-name|"Base", "management", |vprn-svc-id|1 to 2147483647. ParamDefault: Default- Base
Specifies the service name, up to 64 characters.
